name: Roast Beef

description: Tender chicken breast and perfectly seasoned for a delightful meal experience.

description: Tender chicken cutlet and perfect for breakfast or lunch specials.

description: Juicy grilled chicken and perfect for breakfast or lunch specials.

name: BLT

name: Tuna Salad
description: A scoop of tuna mixed with crisp lettuce, sliced tomato, and red onion, sandwiched between two slices of fresh bread or your choice of wraps, bagels rolls etc

name: Chicken Salad
description: Juicy chicken with fresh greens and vibrant vegetables, perfect for a light and nutritious meal.
